data.text: Fizɔgɛ nu ɠɛ ga bala nu, è eteai ziɛ ladalai zu,
É la vizɔni nu nɔpɛ ma, é ʋa ʋala faaɠwɛgi ma,
Nui ná-ɠimalalai ɠa ɗa ná-pelei ɠaaʋala ba,
Naavoloi ɠa ɗa nui wɔɔlai mɔin gola,
Zɛɛ zeelei zalalalai la yɛga,
Nu mɔinmɔin ka ɗa sɔɓelama nui maamusɛ gaazu,
Bala nui la nɛɛni kɛɛɠɛlointi bɛ,
È kigaiziɛi maaɠɔli, ɗa naa ɠɛɛzu ɗa ɓɔɠɔi ɗa-undaanɛɛi vaa ma,
Zɛɛ zeelei zalalalai la yɛga,
É la vizɔni ɠimalala nui ma, é ʋa eteai ziɛ gaanɛ zu,
Nui ná-ɠimalai ɠa a ɗa vɔni da ná-ziiɠulagi ma,
Masagi ná-ziiɠulagi maayikiʋɛ eɠɛ zalai zikɔ wooi,
Faaɠaaɠalala loun zunui ɠa ga kɛɛɠɛ ná-nimizai.
Nu ɠa zoo è pɛlɛi ta anii kpein sɔlɔɔ ga pogani è-ɠɛɛni zea,
Dɔɔʋɛi ɠa ɗa nui wui ɓɔɠɔ ma,
Nii é devei zosu, naa ɠa ɓaazu zɛnvui maazu,
Zɔi a bala nui maawɔinɠa, lɔdɔ kana é feezu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya,
È-loun zunui maaɠolo gelegele, siɛgi zu kitogi ná la dɛ,19:18 siɛgi zu kitogi ná la dɛ: Tati pelei taɠili ɓalaa ka ga nii: mazɔlɔɔ kito ka dɛ ná
Nui ziiɠulazu, kɛni ti ani ɠula zea.
Woilo tɛnɛ gooiti ma, va zelilomai wu,
Nui ɠa ɗa faa mɔinmɔin kɛʋele ɓɛtɛ ná-kisiɛi zu,
Nii nuɓusɛi pɔ nui ná-fai zu, naa ɠa é ga wooɠɛɠiladai,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa ɗa ɓɔ nu ʋa, è zɛnvui wo,
Ɲaka nui ɠa ɗa yeelɔ daami aniɲakai zu,
Siɛgi zu ti waso nui loɠazu la, zɔi é la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛni, naa ɠa ɗa ɠi sɔlɔɔ,
Zɔi é kɛɛɠɛ zopele ɲɔuzu, é dee ɓɛ,
Dòun zunu, ɗa ɓena woilosu kala gooi ma,
Zeele ɲɔi ɠa ɗa tukpɔɠaaleʋe vai ɠaaʋala ba,
Tukpɔi ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛʋɛ ga é loo ɲɛɛɠulasu nuiti ma,
